---

# Data Source: auth0_action_module_version

Data source to retrieve a specific version of an Auth0 action module.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `module_id` (String) The ID of the action module.
- `version_id` (String) The ID of the version to retrieve.

### Read-Only

- `code` (String) The exact source code that was published with this version.
- `created_at` (String) The timestamp when this version was created.
- `dependencies` (List of Object) Dependencies locked to this version. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--dependencies))
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `secrets` (List of Object) Secrets available to this version (name and updated_at only, values never returned). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--secrets))
- `version_number` (Number) The sequential version number.

<a id="nestedatt--dependencies"></a>
### Nested Schema for `dependencies`

Read-Only:

- `name` (String)
- `version` (String)


<a id="nestedatt--secrets"></a>
### Nested Schema for `secrets`

Read-Only:

- `name` (String)
- `updated_at` (String)
